basics.name: Hamin Lee
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Science and Statistics in the Department of Computer Science at the University of Toronto. I expect to graduate in November, 2019.

work.summary: A platform that allows public and anonymous posting of workplace harassment complaints.
highlights: Angular with Angular Material component library and Typescript
REST HTTP API running on a server written in Go
Designed User-friendly UI using Angular Material
GitFlow workflow was used, master->develop->feature branch
Pull Requests was used for code review
Artemis is an MVP(Minimum Viable Product)
Deployed on Heroku Dynos using Docker containers for testability and portability

work.summary: Social Network that connects social influencers with advertisers
highlights: Built a MERN web application fully self-supervised
Implemented front-end using React/Redux and Bootstrap components
Implemented back-end using Express and implemented multiple API endpoints and service calls for serialization and persistence
Implemented server using Node.js and NoSQL database using MongoDB
Has posting, commenting, authentications, like/dislike posts (using Redux Store)  functionalities

volunteer.summary: EON is an award winning Junior Achievement Company
highlights: Led around 50 student employees in a student-ran Junior Achievement company.
Responsible for web development and social media marketing
